thread.title: Glenn

author: Glenn
title: Glenn
text: I have had other agents look after my properties in the past, to me it felt as it was going to be just another property to them and thatâ€™s not what we wanted. I was very happy when Georgina came in board to manage the properties because she took the time to have a conversation with me and understand when I needed from my agent. The service that she has provided has always been of a very high standard and very efficient. I really wish that all the people I dealt with were like Georgina.
